something that's usually pretty easy to
see the hologram because a hologram is
really a precise record of how light
diffracts off of an object at different
angles it's harder to produce than a
regular photograph you need lasers
lenses and special film making these a
popular security feature on ID cards
credit cards and passports but of course
Holograms can still be copied given the
right tools so these days you might also

the same equipment that was originally
